short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Students can receive emergency broadcast messages from authorized school personnel

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Smart Button® is an emergency broadcast system for students. Students can receive emergency broadcast messages across their Chromebook screens from authorized personnel.

The Smart Button® Chromebook extension requires a subscription. If your school or school district is not a current subscriber of The Smart Button® or Anonymous Alerts®, ask them to request a subscription.
